    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:39.759
    | text      = A little, yeah, a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:40.759
    | text      = So Jordan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:41.759
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:42.759
    | text      = As we're recording this, in the recent weeks, Tucker has taken to his Twitter show and it's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:45.940
    | text      = gone from being a weird meandering monologue format and he's done a series of sycophantic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:51.320
    | text      = interviews with horrible people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:53.960
    | text      = The run started with the Tate brothers, Andrew Tate and his brother, whose name I have learned
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:58.799
    | text      = a couple times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:59.799
    | text      = Ooh, Tristan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:00.799
    | text      = I forgot it and then I remembered it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:02.279
    | text      = Then he went on to RFK Jr. and Vivek Ramaswamy, Trump, and then the Hungarian far right president,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:10.799
    | text      = Viktor Orban.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:11.799
    | text      = What?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:12.799
    | text      = Yeah, he did an interview with Orban.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:13.919
    | text      = So okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:15.919
    | text      = And he put out on his Twitter feed a speech that he gave in Hungary that is troubling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.559
    | text      = You know, how about this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:24.919
    | text      = Let me throw this out at you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:26.919
    | text      = I've done some interviews.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:28.480
    | text      = That's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:29.480
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.480
    | text      = And I imagine if I interviewed any head of state, realistically, you have to say this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:33.779
    | text      = person has made decisions that have killed another human being, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:38.240
    | text      = This person said, shoot this block.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:41.039
    | text      = I imagine that a lot of those people doing those interviews, they're like, eh, people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:44.399
    | text      = take that as read.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:45.679
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:46.679
    | text      = But Viktor Orban's a little bit more of like a, that guy might've pulled the trigger on
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:50.840
    | text      = somebody who disagreed with him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:52.820
    | text      = That's a different type of interview in my head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:55.200
    | text      = You know?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:56.200
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.200
    | text      = But, but you know, he's a very beloved in the Trump sphere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.360
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:01.360
    | text      = And Tucker in particular really likes Orban.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:03.480
    | text      = Well, I know, you know, but that's a now thing, you know, that's like, Hey, I'm Prince Mohammed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:09.360
    | text      = bin Salman's favorite journalist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:11.519
    | text      = Now right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:12.879
    | text      = You don't want to know what happens when it's the later it's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:17.279
    | text      = So we're going to be covering another in that series.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.820
    | text      = Do you know who this might be?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:23.000
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:24.000
    | text      = This is why it's so much better when you're off social media.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:26.600
    | text      = I'm just, I have no idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:28.480
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:29.480
    | text      = Well, here's the first clip.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:30.480
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:31.480
    | text      = In retrospect, it's pretty amazing that Barack Obama got as far as he did in 2004, the summer
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:38.000
    | text      = of 2004, Barack Obama gave the keynote address at the democratic convention in Boston.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:43.720
    | text      = And when he walked to the podium, probably only a small percentage of people in the room
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:48.519
    | text      = knew how to pronounce his name.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:50.720
    | text      = He was totally unheard of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:52.679
    | text      = No one knew Barack Obama at the time he was a state Senator in Illinois.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:58.179
    | text      = So people did know later, he once again spoke to the democratic convention, but this time
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:03.320
    | text      = as the nominee, meteoric doesn't begin to describe it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:07.080
    | text      = How did this happen?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:08.080
    | text      = Well, the outlines are fairly well known, though rarely talked about a small group of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:12.759
    | text      = democratic donors, mostly in Chicago decided that Barack Obama was their guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:16.960
    | text      = He was the vessel for their ambitions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:19.360
    | text      = They paid for his campaign.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:20.360
    | text      = They paved the way for his rise.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:23.840
    | text      = He spent two years pointlessly in the United States Senate preparing to run for president
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:28.120
    | text      = in 2008 and of course in the NT1.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.639
    | text      = But the question was, who was this man?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:34.519
    | text      = So there is something interesting about that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:36.399
    | text      = Like no one knew how to pronounce his name and it just makes me think of that interview
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:40.159
    | text      = that DMX did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:41.159
    | text      = Do you remember that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:43.720
    | text      = The one where he sang Christmas songs?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:45.759
    | text      = No, he was being interviewed about Obama running for office and he's like, this guy's name
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:50.860
    | text      = is Barack?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.860
    | text      = There's no way his name is Barack.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:54.919
    | text      = He was like, who just would not believe that someone was named Barack Obama?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:00.279
    | text      = They're like, so do you think you'd vote for him?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:02.080
    | text      = He's like, I'm a felon, I can't vote.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.720
    | text      = There's no way his mom named him Barack.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:07.720
    | text      = DMX is truly one of our treasures.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:10.279
    | text      = Was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:11.279
    | text      = Unfortunately.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:12.279
    | text      = Was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:13.279
    | text      = Unfortunately.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:14.279
    | text      = Um, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:15.279
    | text      = Uh, so there was like a, some lack of awareness of him globally, let's say, and he did have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.440
    | text      = a fairly fast rise to prominence in national politics, but it isn't as weird as it may
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:24.559
    | text      = seem to Tucker.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:26.159
    | text      = Consider that after Bill Clinton, you had Al Gore as the nominee in 2000, he was a charisma
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:30.879
    | text      = vacuum, but still almost certainly would have beat Bush had it not been for the Supreme
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:35.519
    | text      = Court.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.519
    | text      = And then since that point, democratic candidates had been uninspiring to the electorate in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:41.480
    | text      = 2004, you had John Kerry as the nominee, but look at the rest of that primary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:45.960
    | text      = You had Howard Dean, but he screamed it was game over.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:49.580
    | text      = You had general Wesley Clark, but he was kind of boring and a military guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:53.700
    | text      = You had John Edwards, but he was almost fascinatingly bland and ended up as Carrie's running mate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:59.440
    | text      = Then you had Dennis Kucinich and Joe Lieberman who weren't really Democrats and the latter
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:04.180
    | text      = was part of the failed 2000 ticket with Gore and then you had Al Sharpton poking around
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.660
    | text      = in the primary like he does pretty much every year.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:12.859
    | text      = And then, you know, there wasn't a lot of energy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:15.160
    | text      = If you look at this roster, you don't see a vision for the future.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:18.720
    | text      = Hillary Clinton was obviously a political force to be considered, but the democratic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:22.200
    | text      = bench was shallow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:23.839
    | text      = When Obama appeared as a young state Senator with a gift for giving rousing speeches, it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:28.279
    | text      = was inevitable that the democratic party would want to take a chance on him because compared
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:32.660
    | text      = to the rest of those snooze bags, Obama was excited.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:36.019
    | text      = He could captivate people, which was lacking in literally everybody else.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:40.079
    | text      = Yeah, I can't, you know, like people talk about those Bernie Sanders rallies and all
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:45.440
    | text      = that stuff, but there is nothing like what happened in 2008 in Chicago whenever he was,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:52.119
    | text      = I mean, nothing like it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:53.720
    | text      = In Columbia, Missouri, like on election night, people took to the streets to like drunkenly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:59.640
    | text      = dance around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:00.640
    | text      = You know, like it's nuts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:02.079
    | text      = It was such excitement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:03.519
    | text      = It was insane.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:05.279
    | text      = What Tucker is doing here right from the jump is seeking to delegitimize everything Obama
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:09.779
    | text      = achieved.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:10.779
    | text      = He didn't do anything really.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:12.319
    | text      = He was scooped up by these powerful forces in Chicago and made to be the president.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.619
    | text      = Tucker wants to take away the agency of Obama and turn him into simply an instrument that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:21.559
    | text      = other people use to achieve power through Obama as a puppet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:25.920
    | text      = There's plenty of reasons for this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.759
    | text      = Some of it is partisanship, some is racism, but all of it's nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:32.279
    | text      = Prior to being a state senator, Obama was the first black president of the Harvard Law
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:36.720
    | text      = Review, was a fellow at the University of Chicago Law School, worked extensively in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:41.200
    | text      = voter registration organizing, was a reasonably successful lawyer, and he had experience in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:46.059
    | text      = electoral politics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:47.519
    | text      = Now nobody knew how to say his name though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:50.079
    | text      = Well DMX didn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:51.599
    | text      = He'd been the Illinois Senate, he'd been in there since 1996 and had run for the US House
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:57.039
    | text      = in 2000, a race that he lost in the primary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:01.359
    | text      = In 2004, Illinois GOP Senator Peter Fitzgerald retired and Obama ran for the vacant seat
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:07.440
    | text      = and won easily, probably due to the democratic machine getting strongly behind him since
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:12.799
    | text      = they saw a real opportunity to swing that seat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:15.519
    | text      = And it didn't hurt that he was up against Alan Keyes, who is not a viable candidate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:19.519
    | text      = for anything and has recently guest hosted Infowars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:23.440
    | text      = Also if you look at the full candidate list, there was someone named Jack Ryan running,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:27.720
    | text      = who I'm convinced was Steve Puchenik using a fake name.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:31.359
    | text      = As for his short term in the Senate, it's not really fair to say that it was meaningless
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:35.140
    | text      = and he didn't do anything well in that office.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:37.799
    | text      = According to GovTrack, he was right in the middle of the pack in terms of leadership,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:41.799
    | text      = which uses co-sponsorship of bills to determine who's moving things most regularly and most
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:46.640
    | text      = consistently.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:48.140
    | text      = In his less than a full term, Obama introduced 124 bills and co-sponsored a ton more.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:54.680
    | text      = Of those 124, only two were enacted into law, but they were actual things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:59.839
    | text      = One was a ban on the export of mercury, and the other was a relief bill for the Democratic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:04.119
    | text      = Republic of Congo.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:06.000
    | text      = He was in office less than four years and introduced two bills that were signed by the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:09.359
    | text      = President.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:10.359
    | text      = Compare that to Ron Paul, who was in office for 21 years and only got one bill through,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:15.099
    | text      = which was just securing some land for the Galveston Historical Foundation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:19.559
    | text      = Obama was there trying to get some stuff done, and the opportunity to run for President came
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:23.099
    | text      = along and he did it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:24.859
    | text      = The idea that Obama is a full human with agency, that's threatening to folks like Tucker.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:29.819
    | text      = So what he does is strip all that away and treat Obama like a thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:33.720
    | text      = He was an object used by these other rich, powerful white guys on the left to attack
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:38.079
    | text      = the right wing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:39.079
    | text      = And that's the game they were establishing already from the beginning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:42.440
    | text      = So do you know who this is?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:43.440
    | text      = Do you know who this interview is going to be?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:45.240
    | text      = Oh, God.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:46.240
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:50.640
    | text      = Somebody who's his real dad, according to the...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:53.160
    | text      = Oh, that's interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:54.160
    | text      = Like, something like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:56.039
    | text      = That's interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:57.039
    | text      = Some fake-ass shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:58.039
    | text      = Okay, well, let's listen to the next clip and see if you figure anything out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
